trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> can be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>可以重新计算。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used to limit the number of times that a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> runs, primarily to prevent infinite loops.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于限制的次数，<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>运行，主要是为了防止出现无限循环。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this field is `Always`.

This means that the number of times the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> is run is not limited, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> can be run as many times as determined by the chaining cycles in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，次数<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>是运行不受限制，与<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>可以运行的次数由中的链接周期<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>评估。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> can be reevaluated multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 指示<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>可以重新计算多次。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> is executed once.
A condition may be evaluated several times until the rule executes actions, but the rule will never be evaluated again.
trans-unit.target: 可以计算条件多次除非将在规则执行操作，但将永远不会重新计算规则。
